question: Is the laryngoscope free of any external damage/defects?
details: Inspect laryngoscope for external cracks, damage, or dirt.

question: Rinse blade under tap water and disinfect/sterilize
Clean any build-up of material on contact strips
details: Examine the contact strips (blade-handle interface) of laryngoscope for dirt.

question: Remove any peeling chrome (from blade) with a scalpel blade and rub over the edge with sandpaper
details: Examine the blade for any peeling chrome and remove peels with care. Ensure that there is no damage to the blade during the removal process.

question: Does the light bulb power on with battery?
details: Power on the device with battery. Examine whether light bulb gives sufficient illumination.

question: Recharge battery if applicable or replace it
details: Refer BTA skill set on Batteries to identify and replace damaged batteries.

question: Replace bulb if necessary
details: Refer BTA skill set on Lighting/Indicators to replace non-functional light bulbs.

question: Inspect wires and connections from battery to bulb using multimeter.
Does the device use a fiber optic cable and still the light bulb doesn't power on with battery?
details:
There are two types of laryngoscopes:
• Conventional laryngoscope
• Fiber optic laryngoscope
If the bulb still doesn’t power on then there might be cracks in the fiber optic strands. So the unit might have to be replaced.

question: Inspect for cracks in fiber optic strands and replace the unit if necessary
details: If the illumination is not sufficient then inspect for cracks in fiber optic strands.

question: Laryngoscope is working properly.
details: Perform preventive maintenance before returning the device to clinical personnel.

question: Is the blade and handle connected properly?
details: Improper connection between blade and handle may result in faulty operation of the device.

question: Is the lens free from cracks/defects?
details: Any defect in the lens obstructs vision of larynx and vocal cords.

question: Refer device manual to assemble the parts
details: Follow instructions in the device manual to assemble the parts.

question: Replace lens if necessary
details: Identify and replace with a suitable lens.
